entry.data:
SUNNY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
BREEZY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
